page.description: Perform operation across a group of words, if pattern is specified, only change those words matching the pattern.
page.syntax: Output_List as C = WORD_CHANGE(C change_word_format,C text[,C separator[,C pattern[,L match_pattern]]])

argument.name: change_word_format
argument.description: Special commands that govern how the data in Input_List is transformed. These commands are:

item.name: start_position [, end_position ]
item.description: Selects text in the input word from start_position, to end_position. Start_position and end_position can be an expression, or be derived using the $ operator.

item.name: $(string)
item.description: Returns the position in the string where string occurs.
Returns the word number in the input word list

argument.name: text
argument.description: A character string list of words.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: Default = CR-LF. A character string that delimits the words in Input_List.

argument.name: pattern
argument.description: Pattern is an optional filter that can include the * and ? wildcard characters. If each word in the Input_List matches the pattern, then the word is changed.

argument.name: match_pattern
argument.description: Whether or not the pattern should be matched.

page.discussion: Transforms each word in Input_List into a new word based on a format string.

section.note: The commands in the Format_String are the same as are used in owner-draw strings in XDialog.

section.title: Examples
section.description: Assume that the input string, "words", is a CR-LF delimited list with these values:
section.example: dim words as c =<<%str% Smith,Jenny Jones,Michelle Amira,Stone Krayzelberg,Lawson %str%

section.title: Examples
section.example:
dim format as c = "#&' Firstname: '&$(,)+1&', Lastname: '&1,$(,)-1"
? WORD_CHANGE(format, words, crlf() ) = 1 Firstname: Jenny, Lastname: Smith 2 Firstname: Michelle, Lastname: Jones 3 Firstname: Stone, Lastname: Amira 4 Firstname: Lawson, Lastname: Krayzelberg
? WORD_CHANGE("1,$(,)-1",words,crlf() ) = Smith Jones Amira Krayzelberg
? WORD_CHANGE("$(,) + 1,99999",words,crlf() ) = ,Jenny ,Michelle ,Stone ,Lawson
? WORD_CHANGE ("1,3",words,crlf() ) = Smi Jon Ami Kra
? WORD_CHANGE ("$(,) + 1",words,crlf() ) = ,Jenny ,Michelle ,Stone ,Lawson
